title: Water Capacity Not Exceeding 5000 L
fullText: Two zones (Zones 0 and 1) are classified for spa pools and tubs with a capacity exceeding 680 L and up to and including 5000 L, as set out below: (a) Zone 0 shall be the area of the interior of the water container. (b) Zone 1 shall be the area limited by: (i) the vertical plane 1.25 m from the internal rim of the water container; and (ii) the floor, or the surface expected to be occupied by persons, and the horizontal plane 2.50 m above the floor or surface. Examples of these zones are given in Figures 6.17 to 6.19.
